programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick try to prove their 'Life Insurance' protects them from any danger, then in 'Burst Your Bubble', SpongeBob blows himself a bubble boat, and everyone in town wants one!

programme.desc: Mermaidman and Barnacleboy let SpongeBob and Patrick in on their secret heroic origins in 'Mermaidman Begins', and in 'Plankton's Good Eye', Plankton uses SpongeBob's DNA to grow himself a second eye.

programme.title: The Smurfs

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob works the grill at the toughest joint in town in 'The Salty Sponge', then in 'Karen for Spot', Karen looks after Spot while Plankton goes out of town.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Patrick hires cheap ghosts to haunt his house, but gets what he paid for in 'The Haunting of Star House', then in 'Who's a Big Boy?', Patrick hits a growth spurt in his late adolescence. (S1, ep 7)

programme.title: Sonic Prime

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Hefty decides to take Timid under his wing in 'Curing Private Timid', and then in 'Smurfette Overdoes It!', Smurfette wears herself out, so Lazy teaches her the art of doing nothing. (S2, ep 10)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: An accident causes Papa Smurf to switch bodies with a sparrow in 'Papa Smurf Leaves the Nest', then in 'The Stolen Portrait', Painter's greatest painting has been stolen. (S2, ep 11)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob accidentally picks up Neptune's magic trident in 'Trident Trouble', then in 'Plankton Retires', Plankton closes the Chum Bucket and moves, but Mr. Krabs suspects he's still up to no good.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob must figure out how to do his job after shrinking himself in 'The Incredible Shrinking SpongeBob', then in 'Sportz?', Squidward invents a new sport to get back at SpongeBob and Patrick.

programme.desc: No Entrance!: As usual, Grizzy picks the door of the ranger's log cabin to go in and make himself comfortable, but this time it's impossible to enter! (S1 Ep49)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Lemmings Indigestion: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball. (S1 Ep50)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Sonata in Bear Major: Grizzy wants to get rid of the old piano in the garage at any cost, for the Lemmings love using it to make a racket. (S1 Ep51)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Fractions: The Lemmings find a crate from an army convoy transporting ultra-secret material that divides objects into multiple miniaturised versions of themselves. (S1 Ep52)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear that Laid Golden Eggs: Near the supermarket, a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket. (S1 Ep53)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Crash Training Course: Grizzy finds a gadget that enables you to learn anything. He can now become the perfect bear! But first, he needs to learn how to get rid of the Lemmings. (S1 Ep54)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: As Far as Bear Can Remember: An old metal box found by chance brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings. They recall the first time they met, when they were still kids. (S1 Ep55)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Chemical Lemmings: How can Grizzy watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box? (S1 Ep56)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Remote Control: Grizzy's TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. (S1 Ep57)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Bear and the Butterfly: Grizzy wants to offer a butterfly to the she-bear he's in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens he's spotted. (S1 Ep58)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Get Off My Tennis Shoes: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight! (S1 Ep59)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Babysitting: Grizzy babysits for the bear he has a crush on. There's no question of Grizzy tripping up, for he has no intention of taking any risks! (S1 Ep60)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Halloween Bear: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the ranger's cabin and carries on the party with the Lemmings. (S1 Ep73)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Clean Bear: Grizzy wants to give she-bear a plastic ring. But since it was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first, and the Lemmings are using the only bar of soap in the house! (S1 Ep74)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Wandering Spirits: Grizzy finds a strange figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. (S1 Ep75)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Mirror, Mirror on the Wall: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairy tale. (S1 Ep76)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy the Wizard: The Lemmings find a magic stick that makes objects come alive. Grizzy is sure the stick would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings. (S1 Ep77)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Moonwalk Bear: Grizzy tries to stop the Lemmings playing with fireworks. (S1 Ep78)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Polar Bear: Nutty Hill is suffering from a heat wave. Searching for a bit of cool air, Grizzy has a brilliant idea. He'll get into the fridge, where the temperature will be more bearable. (S1 Ep1)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Spread: Grizzy is frustrated: just as he was about to coat a nice big fresh salmon with chocolate spread and snuggle up in front of the TV, he discovers that the pantry is empty! (S1 Ep2)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Cellular Bear: Grizzy's nap is interrupted by the forest ranger's cell phone. (S1 Ep3)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Jurassic Bear: Freed by the thawing ice, a giant egg slides up to the front door of the cabin. The lemmings watch the hatching of a baby dinosaur that soon thinks they are its parents. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Extreme Fitness: In order to woo the she-bear he's infatuated with, Grizzy decides to take things in hand and get into shape with the ranger's bodybuilding equipment. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Domestic Robots: Grizzy discovers that the ranger's new robot vacuum cleaner also gives very pleasant back massages, but the lemmings see the new gadget more as competition... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mass Control: While searching for the television remote control, Grizzy discovers a gadget that controls various functions in the cabin. (S1 Ep7)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Under Control: To make sure that the lemmings don't snatch his chocolate spread while he's taking his nap, Grizzy turns the fridge into a safe - combination lock and all. (S1 Ep8)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Popcorn Party: The lemmings have invented a new popcorn game. When Grizzy notices that his she-bear seems to be drawn by the smell, he invites her over for a snack, just the two of them. (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Fake Brother: Grizzy builds a lookalike robot to keep the lemmings away while he prepares a party for she-bear. But his double is not as clever as Grizzy had hoped... (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Mind in a Whirl: When she is accidentally hit over the head, the she-bear Grizzy is in love with thinks she's a lemming. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: A Sizeable Problem: When a meteorite falls near the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make those who eat them grow to disproportionate sizes. (S1 Ep27)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Treasure Bear: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery. (S1 Ep28)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: In the Service of His Majesty: When Grizzy brandishes an Indian sceptre that the lemmings brought home, the lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. (S1 Ep29)

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Art: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artist's back is turned, the lemmings gnaw at the work of art. (S1 Ep30)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Bubblegum: The Tikis face the Starfish on Candyland. Hung up, Corto offends Oro. But a glitch causes the genies to switch places! It's Oro's chance to prove to Corto that he can win alone... (S1 Ep9)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Art of Illusion: During a training, Corto meets Gavinda Teach, leader of the Mirages and Whale's rival. Teach uses that time to lure Corto into using her technology... (S1 Ep10)

programme.title: Jade Armor
programme.desc: Rogue Beasticon: Since breaking away from the Crimson Lord, Xinyan hates humans. When he gets a Shard that brings out people's animal nature, he wants to make a Human Zoo. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Psycomedian: A comedian gets akumatized into Psycomedian. Able to impose any emotions on anyone, he wants to wipe the smiles off faces... starting with Ladybug and Cat Noir! (S4 Ep5)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug...
programme.desc: ...and Cat Noir: Furious Fu: Ladybug and Cat Noir face someone they know well... and never imagined they would have to fight someday. (S4 Ep6)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Breaking News!: When the Goha Gazette slams Rush Duels, will this new way to duel become yesterday's news? (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Pet Problems: Cleo gets a new pet, Hissette, and asks Deuce, snake expert, for advice which makes Frankie uneasy. (S1 Ep33)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: License to Rock: Finnegan battles his own self-doubt and a giant kraken in order to become the next bandleader. (S1 Ep34)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Power Heist Part 1: When Catarina Stripe takes the role of substitute teacher, Clawdeen and Toralei become unlikely partners. (S1 Ep35)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Power Heist Part 2: Catarina proposes a trade: the Moon Claw for Selena Wolf's diary, which may hold the key to Selena's return. (S1 Ep36)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Gigantitan: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Gigantitan, a giant baby! (S2 Ep5)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir
programme.desc: Riposte: Ladybug and Cat Noir face Riposte, the masked fencer. (S2 Ep6)

programme.title: New: Yu-Gi-Oh! Sevens
programme.desc: Maximum Mayhem: It's the rematch we've been waiting for - Yuga versus Nail! Can Yuga max out his deck and take Nail down? (S1 Ep25)

programme.title: Dragon Ball Super
programme.desc: Goku vs God of Destruction Beerus: Beerus tracks Goku's energy and comes face to face with the Saiyan. He accepts Goku's challenge to fight, but Goku's attacks prove insignificant. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts
programme.desc: The Astronomers in Turtlenecks: After learning of a powerful telescope hidden in a wolf den that could help Kipo locate her people, our heroes find themselves dining with Newton Wolves. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: She-Ra and the Princesses of Power
programme.desc: The Sea Gate: Adora, Bow and Glimmer travel to Salineas to recruit princess Mermista to the Rebellion, aided by flamboyant pirate Sea Hawk. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Dark Cupid: It's Valentine's Day and Kim's broken heart takes a dark turn. Ladybug and Cat Noir have their own feelings put to the test. (S1 Ep5)

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales Of...
programme.desc: ...Ladybug & Cat Noir: Mister Pigeon: Mr Ramier loves pigeons, but the park keepers banish him. When Mr Ramier is akumatized as Mr Pigeon, the park keepers had better be careful! (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Miraculous:...
programme.desc: ...Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir. Timebreaker: Alix's classmates unwittingly break a priceless watch that her father has just entrusted her with. (S1 Ep16)

programme.title: Miraculous:...
programme.desc: ...Tales Of Ladybug & Cat Noir. Terrificator: Marinette's class has to make a short horror film, but the lead actress is too scared to play her part. (S1 Ep17)

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Spell the Beans Part 2: Draculaura partners with her dad to stop the Expel Beast from enacting its wrath on Monster High. (S1 Ep26)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: Welcome to Paroa: Corto has wrecked Maroro! To find a crucial part, the Tikis go to the Shore Scrubber's market, in Paroa. (S1 Ep4)

programme.title: Droners
programme.desc: The Rock 'N' Rolla Coaster Race: Unsettled by the Tao Twin's skills - and by their charming captain, Corto tries to boost Maroro with an ancient Aqua relic... (S1 Ep6)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Bear Game: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. The events displayed in the squares that the players land on come true in real life. (S1 Ep71)

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Ranger Lemming: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. (S1 Ep72)
